entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as the son of Vernon Dursley. He is referred to by name and is expected to follow his father.

entities.name: vernon dursley
entities.description: Vernon Dursley is mentioned as Dudley's father. He is in charge and giving orders.

entities.name: hestia
entities.description: Hestia is a witch who seems outraged by Vernon Dursley's attitude. She is referred to by name and her profession is mentioned.

relationships.description: Vernon Dursley is Dudley's father. This relationship is implied by the context and Vernon's authority over Dudley.
